name: ROOMS (McLogicmaster69)
description:
Welcome to rooms

Within this game, a random maze of rooms is generated. Your mission is simple! Get to the end of this maze.
However, along the way, there are obstacles that will slow you down.
You have to find the corresponding item in order to get past the obstacle
Here is a list of the items and what they correspond with
Axe - Wooden Planks
Crowbar - Wooden Door
Screwdriver - Metal Bars
All the coloured keys correspond with the  same coloured metal doors

This game is currently only in alpha. Expect updates in the future

Alpha 2

Version 0.2
